subject: Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The NFL Network has offered Time Warner and Cablevision a chance for their New York-New Jersey subscribers to see Rutgers play in the Texas Bowl if they accept the network’s weeklong free preview.
snippet: The NFL Network has offered Time Warner and Cablevision a chance for their New York-New Jersey subscribers to see Rutgers play in the Texas Bowl if they accept the network’s weeklong free preview.
